function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Loss of income from tourism impacting biodiversity and increasing reliance on natural resources","Impact":"Disruption of conservation progress, increased threat to wildlife and habitats","Mitigation":"Diversification of income sources, promoting sustainable practices, and supporting conservation efforts","Technologies":"Sustainable tourism initiatives, monitoring and surveillance technologies","People":"Communities, conservation organizations, wildlife","Owner":"Governments, conservation organizations, tourism industry"},{"Description":"Reduction of incentives to conserve wildlife and habitats central to tourism-based industries","Impact":"Decreased conservation efforts, loss of funding, and disruption of relationships with local communities","Mitigation":"Promotion of alternative income sources, community engagement, and financial support for conservation programs","Technologies":"Community outreach technologies, fundraising platforms, remote monitoring technologies","People":"Local communities, conservation organizations, workers","Owner":"Conservation organizations, governments, local communities"},{"Description":"Danger and difficulty of accessing areas in warfare and disaster zones","Impact":"Disruption of conservation infrastructure and networks, reduced evidence base for biodiversity change","Mitigation":"Investment in post-disaster reconstruction, remote monitoring technologies, and international support for conservation efforts","Technologies":"Remote sensing technologies, surveillance technologies, disaster response technologies","People":"Conservation organizations, governments, international aid organizations","Owner":"Governments, international aid organizations, conservation organizations"}]}
